IncludesItemsYouDoNotHave: Termasuk barang yang tidak Anda miliki
NoLocalPackagesFound: Tidak ada paket yang ditemukan di komputer Anda.
NoPackagesMatchFilters: No packages match what you're looking for.
NoLogsMatchFilters: No logs match what you're looking for.
CopyAllIdsFiltered: Copy all filtered items' names & IDs
CopyAllIdsSelected: Copy all selected items' names & IDs
StartScratch: Start a new playset from scratch without any included package.
ContinueFromCurrent:
Clone your active playset's subscribed mods into a new playset.

This might take a moment.
SomePackagesWillBeDisabled: Beberapa paket akan dihapus dengan mengubah penggunaan profil ini.
ConfirmDeletePlayset: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus playset tersebut '{0}'?
PlaysetMerge: Add all of this playset's mods to your active playset
PlaysetExclude: Remove all of this playset's mods from your active playset

OpenPackageFolder.Plural: Open all selected packages' file locations

OpenLocalFolder: Open the folder containing this package

ReDownloadPackage.Plural: Download ulang semua paket yang dipilih

ShowDatesRelatively: Tunjukkan tanggal relatif hingga waktu saat ini
CouldNotCreatePlayset: Could not create a new playset.
CreatePlaysetHere: Create a new playset or activate a previous one by clicking here
DisableNewModsByDefault: Disable newly added mods by default
DisableNewAssetsByDefault: Disable newly added assets by default
FilterOutPackagesWithMods: Hide code mods in the packages page
FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset: Sembunyikan paket aset tunggal dari halaman paket
NoDlcsNoInternet: Tidak dapat memuat DLC, silakan terhubung ke internet
NoDlcsOpenGame: Tidak ada DLC yang cocok dengan pencarian Anda
DlcUpdateNotice: If your owned DLCs are not showing correctly, make sure to open the game at least once

MovePackageToLocalFolder.Plural: Salin semua paket yang dipilih ke folder lokal

LaunchTooltip: Klik untuk meluncurkan/menghentikan Cities: Skylines atau gunakan {0} di mana saja di aplikasi
SelectedFileInvalid: File yang Anda pilih tidak valid
LinkModAssets: Tautan aset dari mod ke status mod 'disertakan' mod
DisableContentCreatorWarnings_Tip: Disables warnings related to creating content and copyright claims.
LinkModAssets_Tip: Beberapa mod menyertakan aset yang diperlukan agar dapat berfungsi dengan baik. Mengaktifkan opsi ini menghubungkan aset tersebut ke mod itu sendiri dan menyembunyikan aset tersebut dari halaman aset sehingga anda tidak mengecualikannya secara tidak sengaja.
ShowDatesRelatively_Tip: Mengubah format tanggal yang ditampilkan dalam daftar konten menjadi waktu relatif. Misalnya; Kemarin jam 14.10
DisableNewModsByDefault_Tip: When you subscribe or add a mod, the tool will automatically exclude or include it based on this setting when the tool is launched.
DisableNewAssetsByDefault_Tip: Saat anda subscribe atau menambahkan aset, aplikasi tersebut akan secara otomatis mengecualikan atau menyertakannya berdasarkan pengaturan ini saat aplikasi tersebut diluncurkan.
FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset_Tip: Paket yang hanya memiliki satu aset di dalamnya tidak akan ditampilkan di halaman Paket. Aset tersebut akan tetap ditampilkan di halaman Aset.
FilterOutPackagesWithMods_Tip: Paket yang menyertakan mod tidak akan ditampilkan di halaman Paket. Mereka masih akan ditampilkan di halaman Mod.
AdvancedLaunchOptions_Tip: Displays extra launch options used by developers in the profile's settings.
ShowFolderSettings_Tip: Menampilkan pengaturan folder yang digunakan oleh aplikasi di halaman opsi.
HelpTranslate_Tip: Bantu terjemahkan aplikasi ini ke dalam bahasa asli anda di Crowdin.
ThemeUIScale_Tip: Ubah warna dan tema aplikasi atau tingkatkan skala UI.
JoinDiscord_Tip: Minta bantuan & terima pembaruan tentang aplikasi di server Discord.
OpenGuide_Tip: Lihat panduan online untuk memulai Skyve.
ResetButton_Tip: Atur ulang pengaturan anda ke pengaturan default. Ini tidak mempengaruhi pengaturan folder.
ComplexListUI_Tip: Adds more advanced information and adds extra actions to the user interface.
ResetFolderButton_Tip: Tindakan ini mengharuskan Anda meluncurkan game sebelum anda dapat menggunakan aplikasi tersebut lagi.
MapFileInfo: Pilih file map untuk memulai permainan baru
FixAllTip: Coba untuk re-download semua paket yang bermasalah, ini akan membuka steam untuk sesaat
ItemsShouldNotBeSubscribedInfo: Anda akan subscribe paket yang mungkin rusak atau mengalami masalah serius lainnya.
WouldYouLikeToSkipThose: Apakah anda ingin skip paket itu?
LogZipCopy_Tip: Buat file zip yang berisi semua informasi logging yang diperlukan seseorang untuk membantu anda mengatasi masalah anda, anda dapat paste langsung ke discord channel.
LogZipFile_Tip: Buat file zip yang berisi semua informasi logging yang diperlukan seseorang untuk membantu anda mengatasi masalah anda, folder yang berisi file tersebut akan terbuka secara otomatis.
LogFileDrop: Letakkan atau pilih file log untuk disederhanakan dan tampilkan daftar error di dalam log
DefaultLogViewInfo: Your last session's errors will be automatically shown here, results are updated live.
CopyLogFile: Salin file log game ke clipboard
CopyLOTLogFile: Salin file log Skyve ke clipboard
GenericIncludedEnabledTotal: {0} included: {1}, of which are enabled: {2}, out of {3}
NewGame_Tip: Memulai game baru saat meluncurkan Cities: Skylines. Anda dapat menentukan map tempat anda ingin memulai
LoadSaveGame_Tip: Load a savegame when launching Cities: Skylines. Not selecting a save-file will continue your latest save

ActionUnreversible.Plural: This action can not be reversed. And will affect {0} packages.

AlwaysOpenFiltersAndActions_Tip: Selalu buka bagian filter saat memasuki tab konten
CheckDocumentsFolder: Pastikan Skyve memiliki akses ke folder dokumen anda, menggunakannya untuk menyimpan pengaturan UI & Bahasa anda.
FailedToSaveLanguage: Failed to save the selected language

EnableThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Enable the selected items in all your playsets

DisableThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Disable the selected items in all your playsets

CopyAuthorId.Plural: Copy the selected packages' author IDs

CopyAuthorName.Plural: Salin nama author paket yang dipilih

PlaysetStillLoading: Playset anda masih loading, harap tunggu sebelum keluar dari halaman ini.
ApplyPlaysetNameBeforeExit: Harap selesaikan pengeditan nama playset sebelum keluar dari halaman ini.
OpenSteamToContinue: Silakan buka Steam untuk melanjutkan tugas anda sebelumnya.
OpenPlaysetFolder: Lihat file playset ini di komputer Anda
CreateShortcutPlayset: Buat shortcut untuk aplikasi di desktop anda
AskToLaunchGameForShortcut: Would you like for the shortcut to also launch the game with your profile?
TextImportMissingInfo: Load a text file containing Workshop IDs to easily subscribe to or manage them
NoPlaysetsMatchFilters: Tidak ada playset yang cocok dengan pencarian anda
ResetScrollOnPackageClick: Reset scrolling saat membuka halaman paket
ResetScrollOnPackageClick_Tip: Saat membuka halaman paket, reset scrolling sehingga paket yang dipilih berada di urutan teratas daftar.
FlipItemCopyFilterAction: Swap Ctrl+Click behavior for filtering in the content lists
FlipItemCopyFilterAction_Tip: Swaps the default behavior of clicking on labels so that normal clicking filters and Ctrl+Clicking performs the default action.
LaunchArgsInfo: Tambahkan argumen ekstra saat meluncurkan game
DiscoverWorkshop: Look for mods on the workshop...
SearchWorkshopBrowser: Search the workshop in your browser...
ControlToSelectMultiplePackages: Ctrl + Klik untuk memilih beberapa paket sekaligus.
Author: Author

ItemsHidden.One: {0} {1} is hidden because of your profile's usage
ItemsHidden.Plural: {0} {1} are hidden because of your profile's usage

ShowAllReferencedPackages: Show excluded packages in the 'References' tab
ShowAllReferencedPackages_Tip: Displays both excluded and included packages that reference the one you're viewing.
TreatOptionalAsRequired_Tip: Essentially, this displays the missing dependency notification for optional packages.

'{0}' is out of date
You are {1} behind

ThisSubscribesTo.Plural: Anda akan subscribe paket {0} dalam proses ini.

ThisUnsubscribesFrom.Plural: Anda akan unsubscribe paket {0} dalam proses ini.

YouHavePackagesUser.Plural: Anda memiliki paket {0} yang dibuat oleh {1}

ResetInfo: Peringatan! Menyetel ulang apa pun tidak dapat dibatalkan.
DownloadPlaysetTip: Download playset ini ke komputer lokal anda
ImportFromLink: Import a profile using a profile ID
PastePlaysetId: Paste ID playset yang ingin anda impor
AssumeInternetConnectivity_Tip: Skip pemeriksaan internet dan secara otomatis menganggap anda terhubung.
AddTagBox: Add a new tag or search here
EditingMultipleTags: Editing multiple packages' tags will overwrite each of their custom tags.

EditTagsOfPackage.One: Edit all of this package's assets' Tags
EditTagsOfPackage.Plural: Edit all of the selected packages' assets' Tags

TroubleshootInfo: If you have a mod or asset that is causing an issue, or that is missing, and you don't known which one; Try troubleshooting it here:
TroubleshootCaused: I'm having issues with a mod or asset, but I'm not so sure which one is causing it.
TroubleshootNew: I recently subscribed to new mods, or some mods recently updated, and my game suddenly started having issues.
TroubleshootMissing: I think I'm missing some mods or assets from my current playset that I've previously used in other playsets.
TroubleshootSelection: Which option best describes your situation?
TroubleshootModOrAsset: What kind of content would you like to troubleshoot?
WaitingForGameLaunch: Waiting for the game to be launched...
WaitingForGameClose: Waiting for the game to be closed...
UseEnglishPlease: * Please try to use English in your description.
CancelTroubleshootMessage:
Would you like to reset to the configuration you were using before starting the troubleshoot?

Select 'No' to keep the current configuration of packages.
TroubleshootAskIfFixed: Did you still experience any issues with the current mod configuration?
TroubleshootAskToStop:
Would you like to stop the troubleshooting here and keep the current configuration of packages?

Select 'No' to continue troubleshooting.
TroubleshootNextStageTip: Skip the current stage. Use it if you've already completed it and want to proceed.
TroubleshootBubbleTip:
This is the troubleshooting menu, it will guide you throughout the process.
You can close Skyve and continue later, it will remember your progress.

TroubleshootCompAsk.One:
You have a package with a serious compatibility warning.
You might want to try dealing with it first before troubleshooting.
TroubleshootCompAsk.Plural:
You have {0} packages with serious compatibility warnings.
You might want to try dealing with them first before troubleshooting.

TroubleshootViewComp: Go back and view your compatibility report's page to make sure you're not using broken mods.
TroubleshootSkipComp: Skip this step and continue with the troubleshooting steps.
TroubleshootCauseResult: The following packages might be the cause of your issues, the current troubleshoot playset will be kept for you to use.
TroubleshootError: An error occurred, try again later, or check the logs for more information.
TroubleshootBusy: Another action is already ongoing. Wait for it, or restart Skyve if it seems stuck.
TroubleshootNoPacakgesToProcess: No mods match what you're trying to troubleshoot.
TroubleshootCouldNotCreatePlayset: Could not create a new playset for troubleshooting. Try again later or after restarting Skyve.
TroubleshootInvalidState: The troubleshooting state is no longer valid. Please start a new troubleshooting session.
TroubleshootNoActivePlayset: You need to have an active playset to troubleshoot.
TroubleshootInconclusive:
The troubleshooting was inconclusive.
The issue might not be related to a specific mod, or it might be caused by multiple mods.
SkyveDetectedFaultyPackages: Skyve detected that some of your packages are not perfectly downloaded, would you like to try fixing them first?

NoCompatibilityIssues.Plural: No compatibility issues with your {0} were detected.

SnapDashToGrid: Show, and snap dashboard sections to, a grid guide
SnapDashToGrid_Tip: While editing dashboard sections, displays a 12-column grid which sections snap to.
UnsavedChangesPlayset: There are un-saved changes to the packages of this playset
DashboardCustomizationInfo:
Customize your dashboard by dragging each section from its title.
You can also resize a section using the dotted triangle on its bottom-right corner.
CreateShortcut_Tip: Creates a shortcut to the app on your desktop.
StartsNewGameOnLaunch: Starts a new game on launch
StartsNewGameWithMap: Starts a new game with the '{0}' map on launch
LoadsSaveGameOnLaunch: Continues your latest savegame on launch
StartsNewAssetOnLaunch: Starts the editor with a new asset on launch
LoadsAssetOnLaunch: Starts with the editor's 'Load' screen on launch

PackagesUpdatedSinceSession.One: '{1}' got updated since your last session
PackagesUpdatedSinceSession.Plural: {0} packages got updated since your last session

NewPackagesSinceSession.One: '{1}' got installed since your last session
NewPackagesSinceSession.Plural: {0} new packages got installed since your last session

ThisModIsRequiredYouCantDisableIt: This mod is required, you can not disable it.
FadeDisabledItems_Tip: Disabled mods & assets in your local content lists will be faded out.
FailedToApplyChanges: Failed to apply the requested changes.
PackagesSelectionInfo: Click on a package to select it, click on 'Confirm Selection' once you're finished.
PlaysetUsageInfo: Selecting a dedicated usage for your playset allows Skyve to automatically hide mods that either do not match, or are not compatible with, your selected usage.
MassSubscribeWarningInfo: You're about to subscribe to {0} mods. Are you sure you want to continue?
DropImportFile: Release to import the {0} from this report
ColoredAuthorNames: Color authors & users' name and avatar
ColoredAuthorNames_Tip: Adds a unique color for each author/user, the user's name and avatar will use that color so it's easier to keep track of specific users.
ReviewSaveFileInfo: Select a savegame to send with your request to help us investigate the issue
CouldNotUploadFile: Could not upload your file at this time
ReviewRequestNotificationInfo: Your review request for '{0}' has a new update
ReviewIsFixed: The issue you've reported has now been fixed. You can use the {0} again.
ReviewIsSaveFileNeeded: The issue you've reported needs more information to be identified. Please send a new Request with a savegame attached to it to be reviewed.
ReviewIsUpdated: The compatibility information of '{0}' was updated after your review request.
ReviewPending: Your review request for '{0}' has been received but is still pending review.
BackupPathPlaceholder: Select a folder where you want to save your backups
IncludeAutoSavesBackup: Include Auto-Save savegames while backing up savegame files
ScheduleOnSpecificTimes: Do daily backups on specific times
ScheduleOnGameClose: Do a backup each time the game is closed
ScheduleOnNewSave: Do a backup each time a city is saved
BackupIncludeSaveGames: Include savegame files in scheduled backups
BackupIncludeLocalMods: Include local mods in scheduled backups
CleanupStorageBased: Delete old backups once the total storage used exceeds:
CleanupCountBased: Delete old backups once the total amount of backups exceeds:
BackupDescriptionInfo:
Manually back up savegame files, settings, and other relevant information to safeguard your cities and mods.

This ensures your current cities and preferences are safely stored in case of system issues or re-installation.
RestoreDescriptionInfo:
Select which backups you'd like to restore.
A backup will be taken before the restore process begins to safeguard your current files.
CheckLogsAndTryAgain: Check the logs for any errors and try again.
SelectRestoreInfo: Select a restore point from the list of backups to start the restore process.

RestoreFileConfirm.One: Are you sure you want to restore this backup of {1}?
RestoreFileConfirm.Plural: Are you sure you want to restore these backups?

RestoreFailed: Failed to restore this backup. Check the logs for more information
BackupContentInfo: Select which types of files to include in your backups.
FirstBackupDescription:
You are doing your first ever backup. This might take a while depending on how many savegames and files you have.

Future backups will take less time as they will only backup new or updated files.
ChooseDifferentBackupLocation:
You can not backup your files inside the this folder, Skyve does not have access to save files here.

Choose a different location that is not in the same folder, preferably on another drive.
InvestigateMods: Investigate only code mods during the troubleshooting process.
InvestigateAssets: Investigate only assets and content packages during the troubleshooting process.
ExclusionTutorialText:
You can remove mods from your active playset by holding the ALT key and clicking on the checkbox of the mod.

You can also add or remove a mod from all your playsets using the right-click menu.
ClearFilterTutorialText:
If you want to quickly clear your filters, you can click on a filter using your middle-mouse-button to clear it.

You can also do that on the 'Show/Hide Filters' button to clear all filters at once.
VersionLockedInfo: '{0}' is locked to version {1} in this playset.
